description: Together, Hitomi, Rui, and Ai are Cat`s Eye, the greatest art thieves Japan has ever known. But they don`t steal for money or fame – they do it in the hopes of finding their father, a great painter who went missing after World War II. While they`re off searching for him in Europe, a new female thief claiming to be Cat`s Eye starts wreaking havoc in Tokyo! She steals anything she can get her hands on, and her brutal methods are putting the lives of the police at risk... It`s time for the real Cat`s Eye to head back to Japan and bring her reign of terror to an end!

REGULAR.description:
Cat’s Eye has hit Tokyo again but the Kisugi sisters are still in France! Hitomi, Ai, and Rui must stop the imposter, but the fake Cat’s Eye has her own agenda!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フランスから来た牝猫

REGULAR.description:
Rui goes undercover to steal a painting, but things get messy when Toshio is sent over to the Organization Crime Division. Now Cat’s Eye has to get Toshio reinstated too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ミッドナイトに濡れて舞う

REGULAR.description:
A group of armed men kidnap children… and everyone thinks that Cat’s Eye is behind it! The three sisters have to get the paintings, take down the bad guys, and get the kids back!
Source: crunchyroll

The unthinkable has happened and Toshio actually gets a good look at Cat’s Eye! Will Hitomi have to come clean and let Toshio arrest her? Or will she find a way to keep him in the dark?
Source: crunchyroll

After many failed attempts to catch Cat’s Eye, Special Investigations sends in the ruthless Chief Himuro. Can Cat’s Eye avoid Himuro, a man who is willing to kill for a perfect arrest record?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 狩人はバッヂをつけていた

REGULAR.description:
After a burglar steals Toshio’s money, he gets kicked out of his apartment. He begs Hitomi to let him stay, but the burglar tracks him down and cleans out the Kisugi household!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 盗まれたアイ・ラブ・ユー

REGULAR.description:
Toshio is enjoying his stay at the Kisugi household, but with a detective staying under their roof, Cat’s Eye can’t pull off their heists. The sisters concoct a plan to make Toshio leave.
Source: crunchyroll

Cat’s Eye steals another of their father’s paintings, but it turns out to be a fake! In retaliation, the sisters set up a trap of their own to reclaim the painting.
Source: crunchyroll

After stealing a gem, Ai panics and hides it in Toshio’s police car. But Toshio’s car gets stolen by a young punk and Hitomi has to get both the car and gem back!
Source: crunchyroll

A thief is brought in for questioning, but Toshio can’t pin anything on him. Cat’s Eye has to find a way to get their father’s painting from the thief before he delivers it to the Mafia!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: もっとも危険なゲーム

REGULAR.description:
A man comes to the café claiming to be Heinz’s art teacher! He’s looking for a bottle of wine with a label drawn by Heinz, but something doesn’t seem right with the mysterious visitor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プレゼントはパパのワイン

REGULAR.description:
Somehow, paintings stolen by Cat’s Eye have been sold back to their owners! Surely, one of the three sisters couldn’t be responsible… right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Mystery for a Winter Night

REGULAR.description:
The painting Cat’s Eye is after ends up getting taken by the owner’s daughter, as she runs away from home! Ai has to catch her, but a dubious private eye has his own plans.
Source: crunchyroll

Hitomi poses as the daughter of a skilled gem cutter to get close to a band of jewel thieves. But with the Inunari Police targeting the thieves too, Hitomi may blow her cover!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For You, the Tear of the Stars
Kimi ni Hoshi no Namida o

REGULAR.description:
Cat’s Eye plans to steal a statue of Mary from a church, so Toshio plans a sting operation—by holding a fake wedding! But can Hitomi be Toshio’s bride and be Cat’s Eye at the same time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 偽りのウェディング・ベル

REGULAR.description:
The owner of a gallery takes a strong interest in Hitomi, but his intentions seem far from innocent. Could this gallery owner be that dangerous?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amai Sasoi ni Ki o Tsukete
甘い誘いに気をつけて

REGULAR.description:
When a sailor’s girlfriend somehow gets ahold of a gem that Cat’s Eye is after, she’s kidnapped! Hitomi teams up with the sailor to look for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さらば, 冬のカモメ

REGULAR.description:
The chief is head over heels for a beautiful woman. At the same time, a thief by the name of “Winter Firefly” has been eluding Inunari Police. Could the chief’s affair be related somehow?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Woman the Chief Fell For

REGULAR.description:
The police have a new computer to come up with security plans! The sisters will have to beat them to the punch and get the access codes from the chief, Asatani and Toshio.
Source: crunchyroll

A new student comes to Ai’s school. He’s good looking, athletic, and intelligent…and has a prized violin that Cat’s Eye is after!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uneasy Feelings About a Transfer Student

REGULAR.description:
Cat’s Eye has been framed for murder! They’ll have to clear their name, steal the painting, and expose the bad guys!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 悪党どもに鎮魂歌(レクイエム)を

REGULAR.description:
For their next heist, Hitomi puts on a disguise and tries to seduce Toshio. But things go a little too well and now Toshio is in love with the mystery woman!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maboroshi no Onna o Aishita Toshio
Toshio Falls in Love with a Phantom Woman

REGULAR.description:
A young artist is replacing works with expertly-crafted forgeries, but is it his fault? Rui goes undercover as a model but what will she do about her growing feelings for the young painter?
Source: crunchyroll

Toshio begs the sisters to pose as Cat’s Eye for a sting operation, but how can Cat’s Eye make their heist with the Inunari Police already there?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enthusiasm Is a Must for April Fools`
エイプリル・フールはお熱く

REGULAR.description:
A young woman joins the police force and falls madly in love with Toshio. She’s cute and tenacious, and she may end up foiling Cat’s heist and Hitomi’s love life!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 気まぐれスクランブル

REGULAR.description:
To avoid being caught, Hitomi and Rui hide a stolen gem in a football at Ai’s school. But when the ball gets used in a game, Cat’s Eye and the Inunari Police hit the field!
Source: crunchyroll

After HQ brings in a new hotshot chief, the former chief, Toshio, and Asatani are demoted! Desperate to return to their old jobs, they plan to catch Cat’s Eye on their own!
Source: crunchyroll

Toshio’s neighbor has an emergency and leaves her child with him. However, when he gets called in for work it’s up to Hitomi to babysit. Can Cat’s pull off a heist with a child in tow?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: サヨナラボクのママ達

REGULAR.description:
An elderly couple is traveling in search of the “Japanese spirit.” Toshio is assigned as a bodyguard for them, but there may be more than it seems with this husband-and-wife duo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Toast to Travel in the Golden Years

REGULAR.description:
Hitomi begins to doubt her relationship with Toshio. Can Hitomi and Toshio save their relationship and reconnect? And will that get in the way of Hitomi’s work as Cat’s Eye?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dancing Belongs in the Starry Skies

REGULAR.description:
A necklace that Cat’s Eye is after happens to be the prize for a contest called Miss Leotard. The sisters enter but they have a surprise challenger to contend with: Detective Asatani!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 素晴らしきレオタード

REGULAR.description:
Hitomi gets close to an ex-convict to find out where he hid part of his stolen treasure. However, the man has two former partners and the location of the stash is inside Inunari Station!
Source: crunchyroll

Hitomi disguises herself as a man for a job. But after she saves a young girl and Detective Asatani from a bank robber, the two fall hopelessly in love with the disguised Hitomi!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キャッツにハートブレイク

REGULAR.description:
The sisters travel to Saipan to track down an item from their father’s collection. They expect a fun beach trip but instead get tangled up in a dangerous trap!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: To the Southern Cross, with Love
南十字星に愛をこめて

REGULAR.description:
A gallery owner has supposedly caught Cat’s Eye on security camera and now intends to reveal the identity of Cat’s Eye to the world on a variety show! But is his analysis right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Your True Face Is a Silhouette
君の素顔はシルエット

REGULAR.description:
An eccentric museum curator has a hobby of catching thieves and now he’s after Cat’s Eye! Hitomi will have to avoid many traps and tricks in his high-tech art museum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nusumi no Chance wa Ichido Dake
盗みのチャンスは一度だけ

REGULAR.description:
Ai writes a script about Cat’s Eye for her school and everyone wants in! As they say, art imitates life! How would Toshio respond if he found out his girlfriend was actually Cat’s Eye?
Source: crunchyroll

2778.name: slow when it comes to love
